sentences.english: In Chapter 1, the concerned symbolic literary theories are introduced here synoptically.
sentences.chinese: 第一章对象征文学理论进行了概括性的介绍。

sentences.english: Instead the neighborhood would best be described as hectic and smelly.
sentences.chinese: 这只能概括为忙忙碌碌和臭烘烘。

sentences.english: Zheng-hou refer to pathologic generalization of organism in certain phase of developing disease.
sentences.chinese: 证候是机体在疾病发展过程中的某一阶段的病理概括。

sentences.english: The innovations of my thesis are generalized in the fifth part.
sentences.chinese: 在第五部分中，概括性地阐述了发生额法的创新之处。

sentences.english: The second part, summed up the basic theory of Benjamin aura content.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，概括本雅明灵韵理论的基本内容。

sentences.english: A psychological reason for asserting "wild" generalizations is exhibitionism .
sentences.chinese: 进行“任意”概括的一个心理上的因素是表现癖。

sentences.english: In the second part, nine characteristics of local structures in northern Jiang-Su Basin are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分概括论述了苏北盆地局部构造的九点特征。

sentences.english: In the first chapter, there is a summary of the espionage and the espionage crime.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对间谍和间谍犯罪的概括介绍。

sentences.english: We summed these results into new viewpoints of the regional economics.
sentences.chinese: 我们将这些研究成果概括为新区域经济观。

sentences.english: This subject surveys the main currents of European cultural and intellectual history in the modern period.
sentences.chinese: 本科目概括当代欧洲文化与知识份子历史的主要思潮。

sentences.english: Generalizations, of course, should never be believed wholesale, but often hold a grain of truth.
sentences.chinese: 当然，概括不应该全信，但还是有一定道理的。

sentences.english: The paper ends up with a summary on the intercoordination between the cold high intensity and air-sea int…
sentences.chinese: 进而概括出冷高压强度与海气系统变化的相互关系。

sentences.english: It can be a profile of someone or about some event.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是关于某人或某件事件的概括介绍。

sentences.english: Confucius has said succinctly with a "too far" to be summarized middle ground.
sentences.chinese: 孔子曾简洁地以一句“过犹不及”来概括中庸之道。

sentences.english: Goldman=system, is a good summary of so many snide mutterings.
sentences.chinese: 高盛＝金融体系，这就是如此多冷言冷语的最佳概括。

sentences.english: China has a four-point position on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 中方立场可以概括为四点。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short/in a nutshell
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
